items.title: Install the Nebulang App Translator
items.subtitle: From the Bubble Plugin Marketplace
items.body:
## Install
1. Open the **Bubble Plugin Marketplace**.
2. Search for **Nebulang App Translator**.
3. Click **Install**.

items.title: General Settings
items.body:
### Fields
- **Icon Mode**: Choose between displaying country flags, a custom icon, or none.
- **Custom Icon**: Specify a Material Icon or Unicode emoji.
- **Dropdown Color**: Set the background color of the dropdown.
- **Font Color**: Customize the text color.
- **Option Hovered Color**: Define the background color when hovering over options.
- **Font Hovered Color**: Set the text color when hovering over options.
- **Active Option Background Color**: Highlight the selected option.
- **Dropdown Arrow Color**: Customize the dropdown arrow color.

items.title: Display Options
items.body:
### Fields
- **Show Scrollbar**: Toggle the scrollbar visibility.
- **Show Dropdown Arrow**: Show or hide the dropdown arrow.
- **Show Search Bar**: Enable a search bar in the dropdown.
- **Tooltip**: Add a tooltip for the translation button.
- **Arrow Position**: Set the position of the dropdown arrow (left or right).

items.title: Padding and Alignment
items.body:
### Fields
- **Icon/Flag Gap**: Adjust the gap between the icon/flag and text.
- **Content Alignment**: Align content within the button.
- **Padding Top/Right/Bottom/Left**: Set padding for the button and dropdown items.

items.title: List Settings
items.body:
### Fields
- **List Height**: Define the maximum height of the dropdown list.
- **List Margin**: Set the margin between the dropdown list and the button.
- **List Animation Duration**: Control the animation duration for the dropdown.

items.title: Translation Options
items.body:
### Fields
- **Translate Page Title**: Choose whether to translate the browser tab title.
- **Initial Language**: Set the default language (e.g., 'auto', 'original', or a specific language code).
- **Language List**: Provide a comma-separated list of supported languages.

items.title: Events
items.body:
### language_changed
Triggered when the selected language changes.

items.title: States
items.body:
### selected_language
Reflects the currently selected language.

items.title: Prevent Translation
items.body:
### Instructions
Add 'no-translate' to the 'ID Attribute' field in the element customization panel to prevent translation.

items.title: Customizing Appearance
items.body:
### Tips
Use Bubble's default style settings to customize the widget's background color, including gradients and images.
